title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a single binary.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, embed, pull, and list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama local inference server.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package (mirror of GitHub repo).

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama—multi-model chats, PDF uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama-webui on npm
summary: NPM wrapper that pulls the latest Ollama-WebUI dist for easy embedding in Node projects.

title: langchain-ai/langchain #ollama
summary: First-class LangChain integration—use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat node with callbacks.

title: langchainjs/ollama
summary: JavaScript/TypeScript LangChain adapter for Ollama—swap OpenAI with one line.

title: embedchain/embedchain #ollama
summary: RAG framework that can ingest docs and run Ollama models locally for question answering.

title: continuedev/continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local code-completion via Ollama models (CodeLlama, etc.).

title: r2d2-io/llmstxt
summary: CLI that slurps any website into an /llms.txt file and summarises it with a local Ollama model.

title: mckaywrigley/ai-code-translator
summary: Convert code between languages using Ollama/CodeLlama through a slick Next.js UI.

title: sigoden/llm-cli
summary: Universal CLI for 20+ LLM providers—local Ollama support with chat, completion, and embedding sub-commands.

title: hongyi-chen/ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style pair-programmers inside VS Code.

title: ollama-rag/ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Flask app that does RAG over PDFs using Ollama embeddings + Llama-3 for answers.

title: sugarforever/chatmcp
summary: ChatGPT-like UI that can plug in Ollama or OpenAI and exposes an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for model recommendations, troubleshooting, and showcase of Ollama projects.

title: hacker news “Show HN: Ollama”
summary: Original launch thread with benchmarks and community tips on running 70B models on M2 Ultra.

title: youtube—TechWithTim “Run LLMs Locally with Ollama”
summary: Step-by-step tutorial covering install, pulling models, and building a Python chatbot in 15 min.

title: npm—ollama-chat-cli
summary: Tiny interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with readline and markdown rendering.
